The lobby's dramatic, light-filled glass atrium extends 46 stories to a skylight ceiling, flooding the space with natural light.

Welcome to Travelodge London Central Kings Cross, your London “home away from home.” Travelodge London Central Kings Cross aims to make your visit as relaxing and enjoyable as possible, which is why so many guests continue to come back year after year.
Close to some of London's most popular landmarks, such as Covent Garden (1.3 mi) and Coca-Cola London Eye (1.9 mi), Travel Lodge London is a great destination for tourists.
Guest rooms offer a flat screen TV, and Travelodge London makes getting online easy as public wifi is available.
In addition, guests can enjoy breakfast during their visit.
While in London, you may want to check out some of the restaurants that are a short walk away from London Travelodge, including Hawksmoor Seven Dials (1.2 mi), Ye Olde Cheshire Cheese (1.2 mi), and ROKA Charlotte Street (1.0 mi).
Should time allow, The British Museum is a popular attraction that is within walking distance.
Travelodge London Central Kings Cross puts the best of London at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

name: The Gate
description: Situated a few minutes’ walk from London’s Aldgate East and Aldgate underground stations, The Gate stands as an iconic building at the gateway to the City of London, providing those who stay there with both unrivalled accessibility to the modern City of London and a beautiful place to return to and relax, entertain or work in after a busy day in the City. With a red-brick façade and clean modernist lines, The Gate is an instantly iconic addition to Aldgate neighbourhood. The Gate is a design led collection of modern Studios, One Bedroom and Two-Bedroom apartments that offer a wealth of features including fully equipped kitchens, luxury Hypnos beds, walk in showers with rainheads and exclusive Le Labo toiletries, flat-screen TVs with soundbars, Nespresso machines and fast, free WiFi throughout. Each of our beautiful designed rooms is a sanctuary, furnished to make you feel right at home. The Gate provides the perfect apart hotel experience for today’s modern corporate and leisure traveller alike, offering a wealth of additional features. There is a stunning 5th floor lounge and outdoor terrace, exclusively for guests and their visitors, to work, meet or relax with a premium glass of wine or beer from our state-of-the-art self-service bar. The Gate has also been designed for the health-conscious traveller with our gym fitted with the latest Technogym equipment, Peloton bikes and free weights, as well as massage, yoga instructors and personal trainers available upon request. Our food and beverage partner, Maple & Co. provides a delicious yet healthy range of hot meals, salads, cold press juices and gluten-free options as well as from our well-stocked Maple & The Gate delicatessen and café in the Ground Floor Lobby.

name: Hotel Marignan Champs-Elysees

As the parisian hotel sits only steps from the Grand Palais as well as from many prestigious art galleries, its address has a natural association with both art and culture. At the Marignan Champs Elysées, customer service is about making guests feel welcome and ensuring a bespoke experience. The luxurious hotel offers 45 rooms and 5 suites , an innovative bar , a private screening room and a seasonal restaurant. In 2012, the interior architect Pierre Yovanovitch, icon of New French Style, transformed the Marignan Champs Elysées Hotel into an island of contemporary luxury, a serene and confidential stop in the heart of the capital. In 2014, the decoration of the Canopée restaurant is directed by the drawings of Julien Colombier and the technology, AV Exciters agency, architecture of lights. This offers the experience of a green haven in the heart of the hotel. All rates include WIFI broadband Internet access, tax and service. Every room and suite offer in-room Tea and Coffee facility.

name: Hotel La Comtesse
description:
Finding an ideal romantic hotel in Paris does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Hotel La Comtesse, a nice option for travelers like you.
The rooms offer a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a minibar, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available, allowing you to rest and refresh with ease.
Hotel La Comtesse features a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and room service. In addition, as a valued Hotel La Comtesse guest, you can enjoy a fitness center and breakfast that are available on-site. Guests arriving by vehicle have access to parking.
For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Paris, Hotel La Comtesse is located a short distance from Louvre Museum (1.4 mi) and Arc de Triomphe (1.5 mi).
While in Paris, you may want to check out some of the restaurants that are a short walk away from Hotel La Comtesse, including 58 Tour Eiffel (0.7 mi), Le Jules Verne (0.6 mi), and L'Avenue (0.9 mi).
During your visit, be sure to check out popular attractions like Eiffel Tower (0.6 mi), Musée d'Orsay (1.0 mi), and Champs-Elysees (1.1 mi), which are all within walking distance of the hotel.
Hotel La Comtesse puts the best of Paris at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.
address: 29 Avenue De Tourville, 75007 Paris France

name: Hotel 34B - Astotel
description: You'll be amazed by the 100% French interiors at Hotel 34B. This 3-star hotel, ideal for a cultural holiday or shopping trip in Paris, is close to the Galeries Lafayette, Printemps Haussmann and Grand Boulevards. Culture fans will enjoy the hotel's closeness to the Folies Bergères, Opéra Garnier and Musée Grévin. Right next to a metro station on lines 8 and 9, you can travel all over Paris in a flash. A charming 3-star hotel in Paris' 9th arrondissement, with its delicate and detailed design, Hotel 34B stands out from the crowd. The interior decoration and French soul of the hotel ensure a purely Français experience! With its innovative and original design and 3-star service, you will be delighted by Hotel 34B. Stay in one of its 128 rooms, each decorated in an unusual style. Exceptional comfort with high quality, spacious 2-metre beds. Use the free WiFi to organise your days. Enjoy your breakfast with fresh and varied produce in the cosy lobby, then relax on the comfy sofas in the lounge. Travel guides and other books on France are at your disposal, to introduce you to the riches of the country and perhaps help you organise your trips. Soft drinks and snacks are available at the open bar in the afternoon. The attentive staff and warm atmosphere at Hotel 34B will make your stay in Paris truly memorable.
address: 34 Rue Bergere, 75009 Paris France

name: Generator Paris
description: Generator Paris is a design-led hotel, offering both private and shared accommodations, located in the lively 10th district in Paris. Free WiFi access is available and it features a stylish lounge area with a games room. You can enjoy locally inspired dishes at the on-site Café Fabien and listen to DJ music while having a drink from the basement bar. Each of the contemporary rooms here provides air conditioning, bed linen, and a private bathroom with a shower. Some private twin rooms also offer a private terrace. A continental breakfast is prepared every morning, you will also find a 24-hour front desk, a laundry room, and a rooftop terrace as well as the shared lounge area.

name: The Karl Lagerfeld
description: Created with a bold vision for iconic accommodations and aesthetics, THE KARL LAGERFELD sets a benchmark for extraordinary Forbes Travel Guide Five-Star hospitality. As the world's first and only hotel entirely designed by and named after the late fashion legend, the designer's imaginative, inimitable style and ethos are infused into its very DNA, from its architectural elements to the specially commissioned furniture and art. Each of the hotel's 271 rooms and suites, as well as its Spa, Gym and pools feature Karl Lagerfeld's bold, inspired blend of rock-chic aesthetics and elegant Chinoiserie elements. The signature restaurant, Mesa by José Avillez, translates his iconic tastes into an exquisite chic setting, while The Book Lounge is inspired by his home library in Paris. Discover fashion, luxury and beauty, fused together into a one-of-a-kind reflection of the world of Karl.

Housing one of the largest event spaces in Macau, Grand Hyatt Macau has its sights set on being the leading MICE (meetings, incentives, conferences and exhibitions) venue in the region. name: Riviera Hotel
description:
Riviera Hotel is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Macau, offering many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay.
Rooms at Macau Peninsula Ritz-carlton provide a minibar and air conditioning, and guests can stay connected with free wifi.
In addition, while staying at Riviera Hotel guests have access to a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and 24 hour check-in. You can also enjoy free breakfast. Need a place to park? Parking is available at Ritz Macau Peninsula.
For those interested in checking out Taipa Village Macau (3.0 mi) while visiting Macau, Macau Peninsula Ritz-carlton is a short distance away.
Macau has plenty of Asian restaurants. So when you’re here, be sure to check out popular spots like Restaurante Tou Tou Koi, The Eight, and Urban Kitchen, which are serving up some great dishes.
Macau is also known for some great art museums, including Macau Museum of Art and Tap Seac Gallery, which are not too far from Macau Peninsula Ritz-carlton.
Enjoy your stay in Macau!

name: Regency Art Hotel
description:
Looking for a place to stay in Macau? Then look no further than Regency Art Hotel, a hotel that brings the best of Macau to your doorstep.
Guest rooms offer a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a refrigerator, and Regency Art Hotel makes getting online easy as free internet access is available.
You can also take advantage of some of the amenities offered by the hotel, including a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and 24 hour check-in. In addition, guests can enjoy a pool and breakfast during their visit. As an added convenience, there is free parking available to guests.
Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as Eiffel Tower Experience at Parisian Macau (1.4 mi) and AJ Hackett Macau Tower (1.6 mi), guests of Regency Art Hotel can easily experience some of Macau's most well known attractions.
Macau has plenty of French restaurants. So when you’re here, be sure to check out popular spots like Le Buffet, The Tasting Room, and Robuchon au Dome, which are serving up some great dishes.
Plus, during your trip, don’t forget to check out some of the popular monuments and statues, such as Vasco da Gama Monument, Matteo Ricci Statue, and Arco Oriente.
We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Regency Art Hotel as you experience everything Macau has to offer.

name: JW Marriott Hotel Shenzhen Bao'an
description: JW Marriott Hotel Shenzhen Bao’an is conveniently located in the heart of Shenzhen Bao’an District, just a 15-minute drive from Shenzhen International Airport and Shenzhen Bay Port. It occupies a stunning modern landmark building and enjoys panoramic views of Qianhai Bay and the Pearl River Delta. JW Marriott Hotel Shenzhen Bao’an offers 356 luxurious guest rooms and suites. Each room is designed in a chic, modern style featuring abundant natural light. Hotel dining options include the Lobby Lounge and the cornucopia of gourmet dishes in a timeless yet contemporary all-day dining restaurant with outdoor terrace. The hotel offers a luxurious spa, a state-of-the-art Fitness Center, Indoor heated and Outdoor Swimming Pools. Eight multi-function venues offer 2,600sqm of cutting-edge meeting and banquet space. The impressive 1,758sqm Grand Ballroom with advanced equipment featuring light-changing LED ceiling is unique venue for various kinds of social and business events.

name: InterContinental Shenzhen
description: Experience a fusion of cultures at this chic urban resort hotel set in the heart of Shenzhen’s Overseas Chinese Town. Blending Spanish-inspired elegance with modern design and time-honoured local traditions, the hotel offers a comprehensive range of recreation, dining and meeting facilities accommodating the needs of leisure, business and conference visitors. The hotel is located within easy reach of Shenzhen’s hi-tech and financial districts, Shenzhen Bao’an International Airport, and the Shekou Ferry Terminal for high-speed ferries to Hong Kong and Macau. The multi-award winning hotel stands out not only for its chic flair and design, but for its panoramic views of surrounding parks and gardens, Shenzhen Bay and, in the distance, Hong Kong. The property features 540 luxuriously furnished rooms and 25 serviced apartments featuring a variety of contemporary Spanish and classical Chinese design influences.

name: Wongtee V Hotel
description: WONGTEE V Hotel Shenzhen is the first 5 star flagship hotel created by Wongtee Group which has pooled all of its resources with the expectation that the hotel will become the first choice for business, pleasure and stylish living. The hotel rests in the heart of Shenzhen's central business district. It is in a particularly excellent location, next to the Shenzhen Exhibition Center, rated as one of the top three exhibition centers in China. The Shenzhen Civic Center is nearby, and the Shenzhen-Hong Kong Immigration Entry/Exit Points are only a few minutes by car. At the same time, the hotel is surrounded by numerous high-class office buildings and within shouting distance of large, modern shopping malls. The hotel’s main structure, which is remarkable for “The First CBD Skyscraper Hotel in Shenzhen”, stretches 60 floors. The architect has used the modern diamond-cut-face style and lots of post-modern techniques and abstract elements to give the building a dream-like atmosphere. Standing in front of the windows of the hotel, one can enjoy a glimpse of the charm of Shenzhen, not just the city over 900 feet below, but also the cozy hills on the horizon. More than 500 spacious and stylish guest rooms include uniquely designed suites and serviced apartments; and 24-hour Platinum butlers offer exclusive intimate services. With 4 different style restaurants and bars , you will find a perfect place to gather with friends and families to enjoy a delicious meal . Near 1000 m2 conference area equipped with the most advanced high-tech facilities and professional catering team. Moreover, well-equipped fitness center and outdoor swimming pool is ready for you . Wongtee V Hotel Shenzhen, the ideal place to enjoy the excellent service and satisfactory stay!

The hotel offers a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and room service, to make your visit even more pleasant. The property also features a pool and free breakfast. Guests arriving by vehicle have access to free parking.
Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as Deng Xiaoping Portrait Square (0.9 mi) and Shenzhen Art Exhibition Center (2.0 mi), guests of Century Plaza Hotel can easily experience some of Shenzhen's most well known attractions.
If you like Italian restaurants, Century Plaza Hotel is conveniently located near Elba Italian Restaurant, PizzaExpress (ShenZhen), and La Terrazza - Grand Hyatt Shenzhen.
Shenzhen is also known for some great parks, including Shenzhen Lianhuashan Park, Lychee Park, and Shenzhen Central Park, which are not too far from Century Plaza Hotel.
Century Plaza Hotel puts the best of Shenzhen at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

name: The Pavilion Hotel

The Lo Wu Railway Station, Huanggang Port and the Shenzhen Convention and Exhibion Centre are within close proximity, while Shenzhen Bao'an International Airport is only a 30-minute drive away. The 291 well-appointed rooms and suites are designed with a blend of elegance and fashion. High-speed Internet access and environmental protection commodities and facilities are yours, but perhaps the most captivating feature of your room is "The Pavilion Cosy Bed"- you can choose from different kinds of delicate pillows, ensuring your personal comfort. The restaurants and bars in The Pavilion are the places in Shenzhen to enjoy cuisine from East and West. From the relaxing Greenland Lounge, the popular Café Pavilion, The Orchard, Gold Rush Bar and Phoenix House to our authentic Japanese restaurants. Come and experience a sensational world of tastes. The Pavilion banquet and conference rooms are equipped with state-of-the-art technology, with advanced visual and audio systems. Whether professional or personal, corporate or intimate, we will ensure your event is a very special occasion. Our large fully equipped Gym, heated swimming pool, tennis court, mini golf, sauna, spa, beauty salon and so forth all add to the unique character of the hotel - and bring you a refreshing and invigorating experience.

name: Tamu Hotel & Suites Kuala Lumpur
description:
See why so many travelers make Tamu Hotel & Suites Kuala Lumpur their hotel of choice when visiting Kuala Lumpur. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a trendy setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.
Close to some of Kuala Lumpur's most popular landmarks, such as Lake Symphony (0.8 mi) and KLCC - Bukit Bintang Pedestrian Walkway (1.0 mi), Tamu Hotel & Suites Kuala Lumpur is a great destination for tourists.
You’ll enjoy relaxing rooms that offer air conditioning, and you can stay connected during your stay as Tamu Hotel & Suites Kuala Lumpur offers guests free wifi.
Plus, Tamu Hotel & Suites Kuala Lumpur offers an on-site restaurant, providing a pleasant respite from your busy day.
Travelers looking to enjoy some crab can head to Fuego at Troika Sky Dining, Mosaic, or THIRTY8. Otherwise, you may want to check out a Spanish restaurant such as El Cerdo, Pinchos Tapas Bar, or The Rum Bar KL.
Kuala Lumpur is also known for some great art museums, including Islamic Arts Museum Malaysia, Galeri Petronas, and Art House Gallery Museum of Ethnic Arts, which are not too far from Tamu Hotel & Suites Kuala Lumpur.
At Tamu Hotel & Suites Kuala Lumpur, your comfort and satisfaction come first, and they look forward to welcoming you to Kuala Lumpur.

name: Mai Inci Hotel
description: Mai İnci Hotel is located in the center of Antalya, at a point within walking distance of historical and touristic places and places to visit. The facility, which was opened in September 2021, was built with a brand new architectural style. The rooms have all kinds of equipment and materials that the guests need and are designed in a completely comfortable way. Our hotel consists of 27 rooms in total, and our rooms are classified in 4 different categories. Economy class is categorized as standard double, superior rooms and deluxe rooms. Our hotel is one of the most suitable hotels in Antalya in terms of price and performance for honeymoon couples, families, summer vacation, New Year's holiday, February 14 holiday, etc. After a wonderful breakfast at our hotel, you can take a tour to the "Karpuzkaldıran Waterfall", Turkey's only waterfall pouring into the sea, by boats departing from the marina right in front of the hotel. After the boat returns to the port, you can take a romantic walk in the narrow streets smelling of history on the historical Kaleiçi peninsula, just behind the port, and enjoy your dinner at one of the venues in Kaleiçi, listening to live music and enjoying the sweet coolness of the breeze on your cheeks.

name: Rixos Downtown Antalya
description: Set in exotic gardens in Ataturk Culture Park, this 5-star hotel near Konyaalti Beach overlooks sea and Taurus Mountains. It offers 4 dining outlets, a lagoon-style pool and a free shuttle to the beach. Konyaalti Beach is 400 metres away. For those who like to work out, the luxurious Rixos Downtown provides a modern gym and 2 tennis courts. There is also a spa where guests can unwind in the Turkish bath, or with a relaxing massage treatment. The Rixos Lounge features a panoramic terrace and serves upscale international cuisine in chic surroundings, while the Beach Bar & Restaurant is located on Konyaalti Beach and offers an a la carte menu. The hotel also features a range of bars serving exotic cocktails and light snacks. The bright guest rooms are decorated with rich fabrics and offer a private balcony with views of Antalya or the Mediterranean Sea. They also have a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a seating area with a couch.

name: Old Town Point Hotel & Spa Antalya
description: Sahili bir gölge gibi izleyen tepelerin sudaki aksi, yolu buralara düşenleri bir çırpıda kendine aşık ediverir. Kral Attalos Antalya için ‘yeryüzündeki cennet’ ibaresini kullanırken, M. Kemal Atatürk ise “Hiç şüphesiz ki Antalya, dünyanın en güzel yeridir.” diyerek Antalya’nın önemini en güzel şekilde ifade etmişlerdir. Antalya’nın tarihi dokusu ile bütünleşmiş bir noktasında bulunan Old Town Point Hotel & Spa, içi ve dışı surlarla kaplı, eksi kent merkezi Kaleiçi, muhteşem manzarasıyla Antik Liman (Yat limanı), Hadrian Kapısı (Üç Kapılar), Yivli Minare Külliyesi, Antalya Müzesi gibi şehrin en tarihi ve turistik yerlerine yürüyüş mesafesinde bulunmaktadır. Ülkemizin en ünlü plajları olan Konyaaltı ve Lara Plajlarına kolay ulaşımıyla denizin ve güneşin tadını çıkarabilirsiniz. Modern tasarım, şık, ferah ve hijyenik koşullarda sizleri evinizde hissettiren Old Town Point Hotel, vintage ve modernitenin buluştuğu noktadadır.

Located in the trendy neighbourhood of Cihangir, a stone throw from Taksim Square, each apartment has easy access to tourist attractions as well as many local and international restaurants without the feel of staying in a big city. Also within a short walk are the many bars, cafes and art galleries of the renowned strip Istiklal Caddesi. Guests should choose MySuite Istanbul not only for the fantastic accommodation provided but also for the unbeatable services that comes with it. name: The Story Hotel Pera
description: The building named after Kumbaracı Ramp, one of the most well-known streets of Beyoğlu consists of 24 rooms with a surface area of approximately 23-61 sq. meters and bar with a fireplace, restaurant and bistro.This building that attracts the attention of people walking by in Istiklal Street with its historical exteriors is located in Asmalı Mescit that became the center of not only our cultural heritage but also the entertainment with lively cafés and restaurants.Asmalı Mescit, the most well-known area of Beyoğlu and the most popular district of historical Pera resisting to being forgotten and defeated by time is the meeting point of entertainment lovers thanks to its night clubs and bars. Current historic fabric was restored with modern lines and it is surrounded by boutique hotels, restaurants and entertainment facilities. Thus Asmalımescit, the center of night life in Istanbul and the mirror of Beyoğlu not only entertains but also displays the finest details of cultural heritage. The building of The Story Hotel Pera dating back to early 1900s and matching with this location elegantly features the typical characteristics of French architecture that forms the architectural style of Beyoğlu predominantly. It was intended to create large suit rooms in this building which was decorated successfully to maximize the functionality. The Story Hotel Pera combines the modernism and history with its high ceilings, large passageways, marble spiral staircase and bar in the ground floor.

name: Princeps Boutique Hotel
description: Princeps Boutique Hotel occupies the fourth floor of one of the most elegant palaces of the historical Monti district, the first district in the heart of Rome. The majestic Basilica of Santa Maria Maggiore stands right in front of the property. The warm and intimate reception/lobby (24h) and offices, introduce a unique breakfast room, divided in three environments and open to guests beyond the usual morning hours, so as to be suitable for a business meeting or as a reading room. Every morning you can start your day with a buffet-style breakfast including fresh fruit, bakery croissants and cakes as well as cold cuts, eggs and cheese. The hotel has 20 soundproofed rooms, all non-smoking, and diversified with and without views. Most rooms overlook the Basilica or the characteristic Monti area and the entire monumental Rome. The rooms, decorated in soft colors, specially chosen fabrics, hand-painted woodwork, beautiful floors and customized furnishings offer marble bathrooms with large shower, satellite TV, free wi-fi throughout the property, large size safe, mini-bar, air conditioned with individual control, hairdryer, and luxury toiletries. As a special Grand Opening promotion, free national and international phone calls are included in room fee. The hotel is located in a privileged and strategic position just 500 meters from Termini Station and even less from the subway stop Cavour. Princeps Boutique Hotel is in the centre of Rome's most authentic, lively district, where a continuous bustle of Romans and tourists - including shops, restaurants, wine bars, cafes, bakeries and boutiques - where the alleys are animated by countless picturesque views.

name: Hotel Della Conciliazione
description: Enjoy your stay in the Heart of Rome Strategically located just 100 meters far from St. Peter's Square and a few minutes walking distance from the bus station 40 Express , which provides direct connections to the main train station Termini , the Hotel Della Conciliazione is a perfect compromise for a good quality services in an ideal location to visit Rome . Completely renovated, the Hotel della Conciliazione is composed of 67 rooms elegantly furnished and completely equipped with air conditioning , private bathroom with bath or shower , free Wi - fi , LCD TV with major satellite channels , mini bar and direct dial telephone. A bar and a restaurant where organize business meetings or events , and a young multilingual staff with customer-oriented attitude, will be dedicated to satisfy every need of our guests with suggestions for any necessity they may have regarding restaurants , City tours , transfers to the airport or to the city and any other service that will grant them an unforgettable stay in Rome with us . A Rich Home made Buffet Breakfast served for our guests every day , will offer a wide selection of "zero kilometers"products , gluten free, carefully selected to ensure a healthy choice for a complete breakfast . Even your children can enjoy a special breakfast with products designed specifically for them . The property is 10 minutes far, walking distance, from the metro station Ottaviano ( line A ) and from the station of San Pietro , directly connected though trains to / from Fiumicino Airport ( main airport of the city of Rome) . OUR SERVICES The brand new Hotel completely renovated to offer innovative technologies without in the charming atmosphere of a historic building , has an ancient well preserved facade , interior design refined , elegant furnishings and 67 rooms and junior suites completed equipped to offer all the services to satisfy any necessity with us during your stay : wi -fi connection, LCD TV with major satellite channels , mini bar , air conditioning , direct dial telephone . The bathrooms are modern in design , with a hairdryer , shower or Jacuzzi .

There is also the Metro subway that connects to the Vatican Museums and the rest of the city. Cosy, welcoming, furnished with classic taste in shades of gold, blue and red, the rooms of the Hotel Raffaello in Rome have been devised to offer a comfortable retreat, a place to enjoy some quiet time after days spent visiting museums and shops. Hotel Raffaello - Sure Hotel Collection by Best Western offers 41 comfortable rooms equipped with flat screen satellite, minibar, free smartphone service To customize your stay, pillow menu, air-conditioning. safe, slippers and quality courtesy set. name: Phuket Graceland Resort & Spa
description:
Finding an ideal family-friendly resort in Patong does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Phuket Graceland Resort & Spa, a nice option for travelers like you.
Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as Patong Mosque (0.2 mi) and Bangla Boxing Stadium (0.5 mi), guests of Phuket Graceland Hotel can easily experience some of Patong's most well known attractions.
Free internet access is offered to guests, and rooms at Phuket Graceland Hotel offer a flat screen TV, a minibar, and a refrigerator.
During your stay, take advantage of some of the amenities offered, including a rooftop terrace, a concierge, and room service. Guests of Phuket Graceland Resort are also welcome to enjoy a rooftop pool and breakfast, located on site. For travelers arriving by car, free parking is available.
Patong has plenty of seafood restaurants. So when you’re here, be sure to check out popular spots like Baan Rim Pa Patong, No.6 Restaurant, and Sizzle Rooftop Restaurant, which are serving up some great dishes.
If you’re looking for things to do, you can check out Patong Beach (0.6 mi), Bangla Road (0.7 mi), or Patong Boxing Stadium (0.6 mi), which are popular attractions amongst tourists, and they are all within walking distance.
Phuket Graceland Resort & Spa looks forward to welcoming you on your visit to Patong.

name: Lub d Phuket Patong
description: Lub d Phuket Patong offers the biggest hostel accommodation in ASIA. From comfort dorm to private room, it also features with large spaces for social activities such as Muay Thai gym, co-working space, breakfast and beverage bar and large swimming pool. Only 150 metres from Patong Beach. Bangla night life & Jungceylon shopping mall are both just a 15 minute walk away and 670 from Patong Boxing Stadium. Lub d Phuket Patong offers both private and dormitory rooms with air conditioning. This stylish hostel features an outdoor pool, co-working space, cool down room, restaurant and free WiFi. Private rooms at Lub d are complete with a wardrobe, a safety deposit box, and a private bathroom. Some units have a minibar, a fridge or a coffee maker. Guests of dormitory rooms are provided with a personal locker, a safety deposit box and a towel. A hairdryer is available for both private and share accommodation. Room types: - Deluxe double room - Junior double/twin room - Comfort dorm - Comfort Ladies'dorm Guests of Lub d Patong may approach staff at the 24-hour front desk for luggage storage service. Interesting excursion trips can be arranged at the on-site tour desk. Laundry service, a shared lounge, and meeting facilities are also available. Within 1 km of the property, guests can find Jungcylon Shopping Centre, while Patong Pier and Kalim Beach can be reached under 1.8 km of the hostel. Phuket International Airport is 23 km away. For meals, tasty cuisines can be sampled at the hostel's restaurant. Alternatively, a number of dining outlets are just a few steps away from Lub d Phuket Patong.

description: Located just a 5-minute walk from Karon Beach is the Chanalai Hillside Resort. It features an outdoor swimming pool, a kid's pool and another rooftop pool that features stunning views of the beach and Andaman Sea. The cozy rooms come with orthopedic mattresses and an almost black-out curtain to ensure a good night's sleep. Amenities found in the rooms include a flat-screen TV, complimentary bottles of drinking water and a safety deposit box. The private bathrooms are fitted with a hot/cold rain shower and free toiletries. Selected room types also come with a deep soaking bathtub and direct access to the outdoor pool. The all-day dining Hillside Restuarant serves a buffet breakfast and stays open for lunch and dinner serving traditional Thai and international delights. For refreshments and drinks, head over to the 2 pool bars for Happy Hours and enjoy a barbecue night. Room service is also available from 06:30 - 23:00 hrs.

name: Centara Grand Beach Resort Phuket
description: Drawing its inspiration from the Sino-Portuguese architecture that characterises Phuket Town, this resort on Karon Beach is backed by a green hill and grouped around its own landscaped water park with its meandering lazy river, waterslides, kids’ pool with a waterslide, and adults-only pool with its own pool bar. You will love the other exhilarating leisure activities on offer, including kayaking, windsurfing and sailing, snorkelling, tennis, and Muay Thai (Thai boxing). Diving can be arranged, and there’s a fully-equipped fitness centre. Spa Cenvaree combines ancient healing practices that reflect Thailand’s wellbeing heritage with modern rejuvenation techniques to nurture and rebalance the body. The resort also has age-specific kids clubs, free Wi-Fi, and seven restaurants and bars. The rooms, suites and pool villas (49 to 209 sqm.) feature a balcony or terrace with soothing views of the pools, the gardens or the sea. Phuket International Airport is less than one hour away.

name: The Yama Hotel Phuket
description:
Escape to The Yama Hotel Phuket, where tranquility and comfort await. Nestled in the heart of Kata Beach, one of the most sought-after destinations in Phuket, Thailand, our hotel offers a peaceful environment where guests can unwind and feel at home. Enjoy breathtaking sunset views from our spacious rooms, complete with clean and modern facilities. Most of the rooms equipped with a bathtub and balcony for ultimate relaxation.
Our staff, renowned for their exceptional service mind, is dedicated to ensuring that your stay is hassle-free and memorable. Stay connected with free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel and take advantage of our affordable transportation options, including airport transfers, taxi, car hire, shuttle services, and even an MG EV charger and motorbike rental for exploring Phuket at your own pace.
Indulge in our dining options, including a daily in-house breakfast. Relax and unwind at our beautiful pool and poolside bar or stay fit and firm at our fully-equipped gym. For those in need of a venue for meetings and events, we offer a function room that can accommodate your needs.
Experience local culture with our trusted tour options, including surfing, local market trips, hidden gems in Phuket and other activities that showcase the best of Phuket. Our hotel is family-friendly, with kid rooms, kid activities, and a pool with a dedicated kid section.
Located just 2km from Kata Beach, guests can easily access one of the most famous beaches in Phuket with our free shuttle service. Take advantage of our easy access to other local attractions, such as Big Buddha, Wat Chalong, Rawai for seafood, Chalong bay for a day trip to the famous Racha Island, or a sunset boat trip, Laem Promthep, Laem Krating or the best kept secret, Black Rock viewpoint. 
Choose The Yama Hotel Phuket for a trusted and unforgettable Phuket experience. Book now and discover why our past guests have rated us highly.

A stylish sea view playground to chill, swim, dine and drink at the sophisticated SKYLINE Rooftop & Corner Bar. Stay at the rooftop all day for the relaxed poolside vibe, serene sundowners and romantic dinner under the stars. Our mixologists have exciting cocktails ready to tempt you with and live music events open to everyone. And when your fun-filled day draws to an end, your cozy cabin with plump luxury bedding awaits. Our Patong Beach hotel is about 15 minutes’ walk to the beach, shopping and nightlife district. Close enough to enjoy the attractions, yet far enough to unwind in privacy with an extraordinary rooftop experience, pampering spa and superior personal service from our shipshape crew!

name: China Hotel
description: China Hotel, located at the heart of Guangzhou is just steps away from two iconic parks, providing a peaceful atmosphere for all leisure as well as business travelers. The hotel adjacent Guangzhou Metro line 2 connects you to all the famous tourist attractions as well as the Baiyun International Airport and the Guangzhou Railway Station which provide ease of access to all major metropolitan cities via flights and high-speed bullet trains. The hotel also features 40 periodic cross-border buses to/from Hong Kong and Macau, bridging you across the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macau Greater Bay Area right from the hotel’s doorstep. Featuring 850 guestrooms, China Hotel presents a classic charm delicately blended with contemporary leisure and business facilities to make your stay the most pleasurable possible! Whether you want to work-out or just relax, our spacious Health Club offers everything you could need to keep in good shape or to unwind including an extensive range of the very best leisure facilities, from sauna, Jacuzzi, 24-hour Gymnasium to an outdoor swimming pool. Our dedicated chefs will take you on a culinary journey through Western and Asian cuisines. Grandiose 1200m2 Crystal Ballroom, a Diamond Room and seven Function Rooms are all complemented by friendly and efficient services from our banquet team – making every business event or social occasion an unparalleled success.

name: Shangri-La Guangzhou
description: Shangri-La Hotel, Guangzhou is located adjacent to the Canton Fair with less than 1 minute walking distance to Guangzhou International Convention and Exhibition Center. Surrounded by lush gardens on an island in the Pearl River, the hotel's 704 guestrooms offer amazing views through the floor-to-ceiling windows of the nearby Pearl River and the greenery on the other side. The hotel offers its guest complimentary Wi-Fi and broadband internet access in all guestrooms and public areas. During the Canton Fair period, the hotel offers complimentary shuttle bus services to the fair, with Wi-Fi available in the shuttle bus; guests can choose to take a walk or the shuttle between the hotel and the Canton Fair Complex. The Shangri-La offers a variety of dining options from East to West put together by award-winning chefs. Traditional Thai and fusion dishes are cooked up with imported herbs and spices at coolThai. Nadaman offers up the renowned menu of its worldwide Japanese fine dining chain. Guests looking for something more local can check out the regional Chinese offerings at Summer Palace. A selection of Asian favorites and contemporary international cuisine is available from the food-theater-style WOK TOO Cafe which provides both a la carte and buffet. Diners at the WOK TOO Cafe can eat inside the main dining hall, out in the garden or in one of the private dining rooms. Guests looking to eat Western cuisine can also head to il Forno, the hotel's Italian restaurant. Guests relaxing in the lush gardens around the outdoor swimming pool can indulge in a tropical cocktail or a light snack at the Poolside Bar & Grill. Live jazz performances accompany snacks and cocktails, coffee or afternoon tea in the Lobby Lounge. When night falls, guests can roll up to the Lift Bar on the second floor and enjoy drinks and snacks while looking out over the gardens and river. The flowing shape of this Guangzhou hotel's outdoor pool is lined by a tropical garden, giving guests a relaxing getaway from the hustle of bustling "Canton," and an indoor pool is also available.

name: Asia International Hotel
description:
Welcome to Asia International Hotel, your Guangzhou “home away from home.” Asia International Hotel aims to make your visit as relaxing and enjoyable as possible, which is why so many guests continue to come back year after year.
For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Guangzhou, Asia International Hotel is located a short distance from Beijing Road Ancient Avenue (1.2 mi) and Muslim Hero Tomb (1.7 mi).
Rooms at Asia International Hotel offer air conditioning and a minibar providing exceptional comfort and convenience, and guests can go online with free wifi.
Room service and a concierge are some of the conveniences offered at this hotel. A pool and an on-site restaurant will also help to make your stay even more special. If you are driving to Asia International Hotel, free parking is available.
Guangzhou has plenty of Chinese restaurants. So when you’re here, be sure to check out popular spots like Dian Dou De (Ju FuLou), Bingsheng Pinwei Restaurant (Tianhe), and Haidilao Hot Pot (BeiJing Road), which are serving up some great dishes.
Guangzhou is also home to Leona Craig Art Gallery, a popular art gallery that is not too far from Asia International Hotel.
Asia International Hotel puts the best of Guangzhou at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

name: Jianguo Hotel
description:
If you’re looking for a family-friendly hotel in Guangzhou, look no further than Jianguo Hotel.
Close to some of Guangzhou's most popular landmarks, such as South China University of Technology (1.2 mi) and Ji'nan University (2.0 mi), Jianguo Hotel is a great destination for tourists.
Jianguo Hotel is a family-friendly hotel offering a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a minibar in the rooms, and it is easy to stay connected during your stay as free wifi is offered to guests.
The hotel features room service and a concierge. Plus, guests can enjoy a pool and free breakfast, which have made this a popular choice among travelers visiting Guangzhou. For guests with a vehicle, free parking is available.
During your visit, be sure to check out one of Guangzhou's popular dumplings  restaurants such as Ding TaiFeng (TaiGu Hui), Ju Rong JiaoZi, and Wuu's Restaurant, all a short distance from Jianguo Hotel.
Should time allow, South China Agricultural University is a popular attraction that is within walking distance.
The staff at Jianguo Hotel looks forward to serving you during your upcoming visit.

name: Guangzhou Hotel
description:
If you’re looking for a family-friendly hotel in Guangzhou, look no further than Guangzhou Hotel.
For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Guangzhou, Guangzhou Hotel is located a short distance from Beijing Road Ancient Avenue (0.8 mi) and Qingping Medicine Market (1.5 mi).
Guest rooms offer amenities such as a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a refrigerator, and guests can go online with free wifi offered by the hotel.
Guangzhou Hotel features a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and room service, to help make your stay more enjoyable. The property also boasts a sauna and an on-site restaurant. If you are driving to Guangzhou Hotel, parking is available.
Travelers looking to enjoy some dumplings  can head to Dian Dou De (Ju FuLou), Guangzhou Restaurant, or PanXi Restaurant. Otherwise, you may want to check out a seafood restaurant such as Tiger Prawn (Huifudong Road), GuangZhou Hong Xing Seafood Restaurant (QiaoGuang Road), or Lia Cafe.
Should time allow, Huaisheng Mosque, Sacred Heart Cathedral, and Temple of the Six Banyan Trees & Flower Pagoda (Liurong Temple) are some popular attractions that are within walking distance.
The staff at Guangzhou Hotel looks forward to serving you during your upcoming visit.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Guangzhou - Science City
description:
Located in the heart of the dynamic Guangzhou High Tech Development District, DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Guangzhou Science City is adjacent to the Huangpu District Government Administration Office, and faces the beautiful Civil Park. The Guangzhou International Sports Arena is within walking distance of our modern hotel in Guangzhou Science City. Enjoy easy access to Sino-Singapore Knowledge City, the Guangzhou International Convention and Exhibition Center, Guangzhou Baiyun Airport, and Zeng Cheng District. Feel at home in a beautifully decorated guest room, equipped with WiFi, a 42-inch LCD TV with international satellite channels, and a seating area. Upgrade to an executive room or suite for a balcony with lake and garden views, and Executive Lounge access, with complimentary breakfast, cocktails(Please be noted that Executive Lounge is not available for now. Hotel will provider alternative choice: enjoy breakfast in the all-day dining restaurant· Elements,cocktail in Lobby bar·Lin Lounge) and 24 hour multi-language support. Start your day with breakfast in the all-day dining restaurant, Elements, savor Cantonese dishes in China House or indulge in authentic Chaoshan delicacies in the elegant Chao Shang Restaurant. Lin Lounge is the perfect place to meet friends or colleagues and sample a variety of specialty drinks and sweet treats. Energize in the 24 hour fitness center or swim in the outdoor pool, overlooking the hotel's private garden. With 22,000 sq.ft. meeting space, contemporary A/V technology, and a 24 hour business center, this hotel is ideal for business events and weddings for up to 800 people. Our friendly staff look forward to welcoming you at check-in with a signature, warm chocolate chip cookie.
【Shuttle Bus】
To provide you commute convenience, the hotel provide shuttle bus service,  details as per below:
Daily shuttle bus to Airport, free daily shuttle bus to downtown, free daily shuttle bus to Guangzhou Luogang Wanda Plaza, free Canton Fair shuttle bus etc. You can refer to photo gallery for each shuttle bus schedule.  Please note that all schedule will be adjusted according to hotel operation.

name: Crowne Plaza Guangzhou City Centre, an IHG hotel
description: 广州中心皇冠假日酒店位于环市东路，是沿线的星级标准国际品牌酒店，为市中心商业及购物区域。 广州中心皇冠假日酒店是广州的一张特色的城市明信片，曾是南中国第一高楼建筑，是老广州人口中的“63层”。酒店拥有四百余间优雅舒适的客房和套房，分别坐向珠城夜景及云山麓湖两大景色，令客人在繁华的市中心，仍能独享一方羊城天地。房间配有无线网络及可供客人选择的系列枕头菜单，让客人在繁忙的差旅途中仍能感受家的感觉。酒店步行约200米即可抵达淘金或小北地铁站，离北京路直线距离约2.5公里，距离广州琶洲展览中心直线距离约12公里。酒店行政总厨带领其资深的厨师团队，为海内外宾客打造能诠释广府美食天堂的2间不同特色主题的餐饮餐厅，它们分别为：主打“粤”菜特色的百粤楼；以及集无国界美食于一体的环市食坊自助餐厅。环市夜赏，是酒店的特色之一，也是旅客居停旅途上的必到之处。360度无边视觉，任意饱览火烧夕霞的羊城晚景，璀璨辉煌的珠江新城夜景，远眺小蛮腰-广州塔。再点上一杯特制的鸡尾酒，愿您与亲朋共度美好的居停时光，酒店更配有室外游泳池，生spa和桑拿等尊享设施。 广州中心皇冠假日酒店，第属于英国IHG洲际酒店集团。全球拥有超过5600间酒店单体，屡获殊荣的皇冠假日酒店及度假村品牌，在65个国家中拥有近426家酒店，是全球连锁高档酒店品牌之一。 广州中心皇冠假日酒店，致力助您成就高效商旅！ The new Crowne Plaza Guangzhou City Centre is an exclusive international 5-star hotel located on Huanshi Road East, the heart of downtown’s bustling commercial and shopping district. Crowne Plaza Guangzhou City Centre is located nearby Beijing Road, 2.5 km, one of the most popular tourist spot for Guangzhou historic stories and shopping district. Also, an airport express bus station is located at the hotel’s entrance, 7km to Guangzhou East Railway Station and walking distance 200m to Guangzhou Metro Station. The hotel features 460 well appointed guest rooms and suites with an extensive city or greenery view. Complimentary wi-fi and a collection of specialty pillows are on offer. Club floors with 73 rooms and suites offer personalized service and additional privacy for the needs of today’s busy executives. In addition, two superb restaurants and a lobby lounge are on offer, including Baiyuelou, a popular Cantonese restaurant featuring organic, fresh and healthy specialties; Appetite, all-day international dining hosted by engaging chefs in show-kitchens offers a lavish buffet selection; and the Lobby Lounge, offering a relaxing atmosphere where guests can enjoy a variety of cocktails, fine wines and beers, as well as an array of your favorite appetizers. Over 2,000 sq meters of meeting space includes a 985 square-meter pillar-less Crystal Ballroom with an impressive 9 meter high ceiling. The Pearl Ballroom, Diamond Boardroom and 9 Jade function rooms feature state-of-the-art audio-visual equipment.

name: Voco Makkah
description:
Embark on the spiritual journey of a lifetime with voco Makkah by your side every step of the way. Our prime location near Haram is ideal for Hajj and Umrah pilgrimages, and our shuttle service ensures you arrive at The Holy Mosque with ease. Both Mount Mina and Mount Arafat are just a stone's throw away. 

 Our spacious rooms can accommodate up to seven guests, making them perfect for families or groups traveling together. Each room boasts a modern and elegant design, premium mattresses, and luxurious cotton sheets to ensure your utmost comfort. The well-equipped bathrooms feature refreshing aerated showers and high-quality toiletries. For those seeking even more space to unwind, our suites offer a comfortable living area to relax in style. 

 After a long day of Umrah or Hajj, relax in our stylish lobby with cool marble floors and comfortable chairs. Complimentary Wi-Fi allows you to stay connected with loved ones back home.
address: Ibrahim Al Khalil Road Al Mesfalah, Mecca Saudi Arabia
hotelClassAttribution: This property is classified according to Giata.

name: Jabal Omar Marriott Hotel, Makkah
description: Jabal Omar Marriott Hotel, Makkah is located in the heart of the holy city of Makkah, which is one of the most luxurious five-star hotels in Jabal Omar complex, only 3 minutes- walk to Al Masjid Al-Haram. The hotel offers 426 luxurious and spacious rooms in a modern style including 52 luxurious suites, an architectural masterpiece lobby and reception area. Hotel features two restaurants: Spice Market and Olive, offering views of the Holy Haram and the city, in addition to Atrium Café, which serves snacks, light meals, pastries and soft drinks. You can discover our private prayer hall overlooking the Haram, and listen to the harm Imam via our linked sound system. The hotel also offers modern business center and medium-size meeting rooms with a large pre-function area. Enjoy your shopping in Jabal Omar commercial center next to the hotel and discover all that is unique and interesting about Makkah, Saudi Arabia, from Jabal Omar Marriott Hotel, Makkah, making your stay an unforgettable experience.

name: Elaf Kinda Hotel
description:
Looking for a place to stay in Mecca? Then look no further than Elaf Kinda Hotel, a family-friendly hotel that brings the best of Mecca to your doorstep.
Rooms at Elaf Kindah Makkah Hotel provide a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a refrigerator, and guests can stay connected with free wifi.
In addition, while staying at Elaf Kinda Hotel guests have access to a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and room service. You can also enjoy free breakfast.
While in Mecca be sure to experience local shrimp favorites at Albaik.
Mecca is also home to Kaaba, a popular historic site that is not too far from Elaf Kinda Hotel.
We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Elaf Kinda Hotel as you experience everything Mecca has to offer.

name: Elaf Bakkah Hotel
description:
Everyone needs a place to lay their weary head. For travelers visiting Mecca, Elaf Bakkah Hotel is an excellent choice for rest and rejuvenation. Well-known for its proximity to great restaurants and attractions, Elaf Bakkah Hotel makes it easy to enjoy the best of Mecca.
Guest rooms offer a refrigerator, air conditioning, and a minibar, and Elaf Bakkah Hotel makes getting online easy as free wifi is available.
You can also take advantage of some of the amenities offered by the hotel, including a 24 hour front desk, room service, and a concierge. In addition, guests can enjoy an on-site restaurant during their visit. As an added convenience, there is free parking available to guests.
Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as Grand Mosque (1.4 mi) and Station of Ibrahim (1.4 mi), guests of Elaf Bakkah Hotel can easily experience some of Mecca's most well known attractions.
If you like Indian restaurants, Elaf Bakkah Hotel is conveniently located near paradise restaurant and Khair Restaurant.
Should time allow, UmrahLimo is a popular attraction that is within walking distance.
Whether you’re traveling for business, pleasure or both, Elaf Bakkah Hotel is sure to make your visit to Mecca one worth remembering.

At Jumeirah Makkah, we redefine hospitality in Makkah with our unwavering commitment to exceptional service and meticulous attention to detail. Choose from our diverse range of accommodations, including 752 thoughtfully designed rooms, 281 exquisite suites, and 88 luxurious residences. Experience a stay that surpasses all expectations and leaves an indelible mark on your heart, as we understand that your visit to Makkah is a defining lifetime moment and an opportunity to create lasting memories.

name: U Jomtien Pattaya
description: U Jomtien Pattaya features 64 rooms and suites with panoramic sea views, direct access to the beach and signature features like “Breakfast Whenever Wherever” and our “U Choose Programme.” Our 4-star hotel is located on Jomtien Beach, offering a peaceful retreat from the hustle and bustle of Pattaya yet just minutes away from top shopping and entertainment area, zoo and aquarium. Boasting impressive contemporary architecture and interiors, the hotel is beautifully appointed with deluxe amenities. Indulge yourself in a superb range of 4-star features, including a large rooftop swimming pool, an all-day dining restaurant with terrace bar, a library, a gym and a large garden area. Guests can enjoy and experience U Hotels’ unique concept of service, including a 24-hour room that will allow you to enjoy your room for a full 24 hours from check-in, as well as breakfast whenever/wherever during your stay.

name: Centara Life Maris Resort Jomtien
description: Centara Life Maris Resort Jomtien is bursting with fresh new style, complete with a wide-open pool area that is enclosed in lush gardens. Accommodation comes in different styles, all of which featuring generous living space (35-69 sqm.) designed with a blend of light wood furnishings, clean lines, and splashes of vivid colours. You’ll enjoy the option of a family residence with bunk beds for children, or a private retreat with plunge pool. The resort has a fitness centre and a spa with 12 treatment rooms for singles and couples, plus a venue dedicated to Thai foot massage and a relaxation pavilion. The resort features also features two kids’ clubs with activities, and a children’s pool – a world to explore with slides and a water play area. You'll also find two restaurants and a swim-up pool bar, and Wi-Fi is available free of charge. Bangkok’s Suvarnabhumi Airport is reached in approximately 90 minutes and U-Tapao Rayong-Pattaya International Airport is only 35 kilometres away.

name: Centara Grand Mirage Beach Resort Pattaya
description: Centara Grand Mirage Beach Resort Pattaya is an exciting Lost World themed resort on Wong Amat Beach. You will enjoy 555 sea-facing rooms, suites and family residences (from 42 to 326 sqm.), eight dining venues, an award-winning spa, and a gigantic water park. The Lost World features a freeform pool, a meandering lazy river, waterslides, an adult’s pool, Jacuzzis, cliff jumping platforms, and Monsoon Island children’s water playground. Children can also enjoy two kids clubs, a club lounge dedicated to families, and a plethora of activities. The 230-metre beach is perfect for water sports. A PADI dive centre is also available. Spa Cenvaree is a true refuge for the senses and has 24 treatment rooms and a yoga and meditation pavilion. Other facilities include a fitness centre, two tennis courts and rock climbing facilities. A shuttle service connects to Central Festival Pattaya shopping and lifestyle centre. Bangkok’s Suvarnabhumi International Airport is approximately 90 minutes away.

name: Red Planet Pattaya
description: The 192-room Red Planet Pattaya is the lift guests need to tap into this dynamic destination for all its worth. Designed for both business and leisure travellers, Red Planet Pattaya is situated in North Pattaya on Second Road, providing guests with easily access to Pattaya Beach, the Royal Garden Plaza, the Pattaya Avenue Shopping Mall, excellent restaurants serving local and international food and a pulsating nightlife. The Red Planet Pattaya has redefined the value-hotel sector by offering an all-inclusive rate for every room, every night. All rooms have free high-speed Wi-Fi (up to three devices), soothing power showers, quality custom-made beds with upscale linen and many other features including air conditioning, in-room safes, hair dryers, ceiling fans and a 32-inch flat screen TV. There are no hidden costs in the room rates or the amenities we provide.

There is a wide range of facilities that combine "outer space design and innovative technology," from cutting-edge façades inspired by space shuttles to space-themed facility settings. Spend a day in one of Pattaya's largest Water Park with approximately 11,500 sq.m. space water park devided to four themed zones or take a fun break in a kids' area designed like the spaceship building "Astro Club," an indoor family playground complex packed with creativity and hands-on experience for guests of all ages, there is something for everyone. "Let's Relax Onsen & Spa," Thailand's first sea view onsen, is located here at Grande Centre Point Space Pattaya, where guests may discover their own serenity among the hustle and bustle of Pattaya city. The Space Convention Centre has cutting-edge technology for business travelers. The grand ballroom features the latest LED technology screen, an 8-meter ceiling, and pillarless conference spaces. With a variety of culinary selections, visitors of all ages will find the hotel to be perfect and convenient.

name: Cityinn Hotel Plus - Fuxing N. Rd., Branch
description:
See why so many travelers make Cityinn Hotel Plus - Fuxing N. Rd., Branch their hotel of choice when visiting Zhongshan District. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a charming setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.
Close to some of Zhongshan District's most popular landmarks, such as Sihmianfo (0.8 mi) and Airport Alley (1.2 mi), Cityinn Hotel Plus - Fuxing N. Rd., Branch is a great destination for tourists.
Guest rooms offer a flat screen TV, a refrigerator, and air conditioning, and Cityinn Hotel Plus - Fuxing N. Rd., Branch makes getting online easy as free wifi is available.
You can also take advantage of some of the amenities offered by the hotel, including a concierge. As an added convenience, there is free parking available to guests.
During your visit, be sure to check out one of Zhongshan District's popular sukiyaki & shabu shabu restaurants such as Addiction Aquatic Development and Mihan Honke, all a short distance from Cityinn Hotel Plus - Fuxing N. Rd., Branch.
Looking to explore? Then look no further than Hsing Tian Kong (0.7 mi), which is a popular Zhongshan District attraction – and it is conveniently located within walking distance of the hotel.
At Cityinn Hotel Plus - Fuxing N. Rd., Branch, your comfort and satisfaction come first, and they look forward to welcoming you to Zhongshan District.

name: The Riviera Hotel Taipei
description: The Riviera Hotel Taipei is proud to be the First and Only hotel in Taiwan to receive our LEED Gold Certification in November, 2012. Situated at the business hub of bustling Taipei city stands an international traveler oasis of serenity and refinement --- the Riviera Taipei boutique hotel, has 112 rooms; a Mediterranean Steak House restaurant, a Yacht Club restaurant, and a banquet room that can seat 240 people banquet style. The Riviera Taipei boutique hotel is designed by the world-renowned French architect, Mr. Gerard Jardonnet, with the theme of cordial sophistication of southern France, punctuated by the mystic authenticity of the Orient. Apart from the traditional accommodation service, the Riviera Taipei Hotel offers to her room guests quite a number of additional benefits completely free of charge. Internet Wired and Wireless Internet Access completely FREE of charge ANYWHERE within the boutique Riviera Taipei Hotel. Free Shuttle To MRT Yuanshan Station, CKS Memorial Hall, Yongkang St, Taipei 101, Confucius Temple, Shilin Night Market, CKS Shilin Residence, National Palace Museum and Taipei World Trade Center / Nangang Exhibition Center during Major Trade Shows in fixed period of time. The Riviera Taipei hotel is adjacent to Taipei Expo Park. Nearby attractions are Shihlin Night Market and National Palace Museum.

name: Via Hotel Loft
description:
See why so many travelers make Via Hotel Loft their motel of choice when visiting Zhongshan District. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a family-friendly setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.
Close to some of Zhongshan District's most popular landmarks, such as SPOT-Taipei（Taipei Film House） (0.4 mi) and Jingfugong (0.6 mi), Via Hotel Loft is a great destination for tourists.
Free wifi is offered to guests, and rooms at Via Hotel Loft offer a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a refrigerator.
Guests of Via Hotel Loft are also welcome to enjoy free breakfast, located on site.
During your visit, be sure to check out one of Zhongshan District's popular sukiyaki & shabu shabu restaurants such as Addiction Aquatic Development and Mihan Honke, all a short distance from Via Hotel Loft.
Looking to explore? Then look no further than National Revolutionary Martyrs' Shrine, Suho Memorial Paper Culture Museum, and Kuomintang Party History Museum, which are some popular Zhongshan District history museums – all conveniently located a short distance from the motel.
At Via Hotel Loft, your comfort and satisfaction come first, and they look forward to welcoming you to Zhongshan District.

description:

Rooms at Taipei Garden Hotel provide a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a refrigerator, and guests can stay connected with free wifi.
In addition, while staying at Taipei Garden Hotel guests have access to a rooftop terrace, a concierge, and room service. You can also enjoy a hot tub and breakfast. Need a place to park? Free parking is available at Taipei Garden Hotel.
Close to some of Zhongzheng District's most popular landmarks, such as Presidential Office Building (0.4 mi) and Taipei Zhongshan Hall (0.5 mi), Taipei Garden Hotel is a great destination for tourists.
If you like Korean restaurants, Taipei Garden Hotel is conveniently located near Maishida Hanshi Liaoli, Zhangshoumachiqian, and Mai Shi Da Korean Restaurant.
If you are interested in exploring Zhongzheng District, check out one of the monuments and statues, such as Yisian Park and Taiwan Railway Steam locomotive No. LDK58.
Taipei Garden Hotel puts the best of Zhongzheng District at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

name: citizenM Miami Brickell Hotel
description:
citizenM Miami Brickell is not only the first citizenM hotel in Miami - it's also our first ever with a swimming pool! In a city with all-year sunshine, we want to give the guests something extra special to enjoy, in addition to our usual fabulous design, smart bedrooms and contactless stays. The swimming pool is located outdoors on the rooftop, together with a fitness room and indoor/outdoor bar. For business travellers, the hotel will have 8 stylish and inspiring meeting rooms, available for booking anytime - AM, PM, all day and on weekends. citizenM hotels are in a category all on their own - affordable luxury. This means guests don't pay for the usual hotel cliches (like chocolates on pillows), but instead they enjoy all hotel essentials of the highest quality: beds, showers, entertainment, guest service, efficiency and more. Instead of a lobby, citizenM Miami Brickell will feature the fabulous (signature) living room instead of a lifeless lobby. In the living room: world-class art, colourful designer furniture, dozens of books, and 24/7 food within an arm's reach - just like at home. The citizenM living rooms are perfect for work, rest and play - with a craft cocktail in hand, of course. Every citizenM bedroom is optimised for maximum relaxation and designed for maximum 2 adults. All bedrooms are the same, so all guests enjoy the same luxury. In each bedroom: XL king-size bed with luxury European bedding and fluffy pillows, walk-in shower with jungle-like water pressure, full-size shower gels, flatscreen TV with entertainment and streaming capabilities, and superfast free Wi-Fi. Our hot & cold breakfast buffet comes with unique local treats, familiar favorites, and healthy options for everyone — including vegans and vegetarians. Pile your plate with warm pastries, scrambled eggs, fresh fruit, and more. 

citizenM Miami Brickell hotel has a rooftop pool! Access to the pool is for hotel guests only. All guests receive a tote bag, water bottle, a free welcome drink (alcohol for 21+ only), and access to private beach in South Beach (including two beach chairs and towels).

name: The Charles Hotel
description: N intimate ambiance and excellent service. Occupying a historic medieval building, the charming Charles Hotel has been beautifully restored whilst retaining many of its original features. The Charles Hotel is situated close to The Charles Bridge. Surrounded by good selection of bars and restaurants, this intimate property enjoys a romantic ambiance. Located in the charming historical district of Prague Mala Strana (also called Prague Lesser Town or Little Quarter of Prague) and close to the famous Charles Bridge, Prague Castle, romantic Kampa, Petrin parks and just across the bridge to the rest of Old Town. The Hotel Charles is part of the Royal Road, which starts in Nuremberg (Germany) and leads all the way to Prague Castle through the Powder Tower, Wenceslas Square and across Charles Bridge. All 31 rooms of our hotel are air conditioned. 25 Rooms and 6 suites are reflecting the building's rich heritage and providing our guests with comfortable accommodation, an exceptional service and modern amenities. Baroque-style rooms include satellite television, minibar, in-room safe and hairdryer. Breakfast room and lobby bar are necessary to make you feel special. Friendly, attentive staff and a perfect location make it an excellent choice. The Charles hotel is romantic accommodation in the middle of Prague history!

name: The President
description: The President Hotel in the centre of Prague is visited by fans of tourism and relaxation, namely thanks to its advantageous location. The President Hotel is located on the right bank of the Vltava river, between the Charles Bridge and the Cloister of St. Agnes of Bohemia. Thanks to its ideal position in the centre of Prague, the President Hotel is located only a short walk from renowned historical monuments such as the Charles Bridge, Prague Castle, Old Town Square, National Theatre, Jewish Quarter, Synagogues and other places of interest in the heart of one of the most beautiful cities of the Czech Republic. The unique position allows you to conveniently visit the Pařížská street, a luxurious shopping venue with an abundance of fashion shops and restaurants.

description:

As your “home away from home,” the hotel rooms offer a flat screen TV and air conditioning, and getting online is easy, with free wifi available.

And, as an added convenience, there is paid public parking available nearby.
For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Shanghai, City Hotel Shanghai is located a short distance from Jing'an Temple (0.7 mi) and Jade Buddha Temple (1.5 mi).
While in Shanghai be sure to experience local tempura favorites at Shintori, Haiku by Hatsune, or Sun with Aqua.
Shanghai is also known for some great architectural buildings, including Shanghai Circus World, Oriental Pearl Tower (Dongfang Mingzhu), and Jin Mao Tower, which are not too far from City Hotel Shanghai.
Enjoy your stay in Shanghai!

name: Grand Central Hotel Shanghai
description:
If you’re looking for a family-friendly hotel in Shanghai, look no further than Grand Central Hotel Shanghai.
Close to some of Shanghai's most popular landmarks, such as Old Town (Nanshi) (0.9 mi) and Shanghai Tower (1.4 mi), Grand Central Hotel Shanghai is a great destination for tourists.
Guest rooms offer a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a minibar, and Grand Central Hotel Shanghai makes getting online easy as free wifi is available.
You can also take advantage of some of the amenities offered by the hotel, including room service and a concierge. In addition, guests can enjoy a pool and a lounge during their visit.
If you’re looking for a cafe, consider a visit to Starbucks Reserve Roastery Shanghai, Wow Cafe & Bar, or The Press by Inno Coffee, which are all conveniently located a short distance from Grand Central Hotel Shanghai.
If you’re looking for things to do, you can check out Yu Garden (Yuyuan) (0.8 mi), The Bund (Wai Tan) (0.7 mi), or Oriental Pearl Tower (Dongfang Mingzhu) (1.1 mi), which are popular attractions amongst tourists, and they are all within walking distance.
The staff at Grand Central Hotel Shanghai looks forward to serving you during your upcoming visit.

name: The Palazzo at The Venetian
description:
Looking for a place to stay in Las Vegas? Then look no further than The Palazzo Resort Hotel Casino, a family-friendly hotel that brings the best of Las Vegas to your doorstep.
You’ll enjoy relaxing rooms that offer a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a minibar, and you can stay connected during your stay as The Palazzo Resort Hotel Casino offers guests free internet access.
The hotel features a concierge and room service. Plus, Palazzo Las Vegas Reviews offers a pool and breakfast, providing a pleasant respite from your busy day. For guests with a vehicle, free parking is available.
Close to some of Las Vegas' most popular landmarks, such as Mirage Volcano (0.3 mi) and The LINQ Promenade (0.4 mi), The Palazzo Resort Hotel Casino is a great destination for tourists.
When you’re feeling hungry, be sure to check out Ellis Island BBQ, Rollin Smoke Barbeque, and Hobak Korean BBQ, which are some barbeque restaurants that are popular with locals and out-of-towners alike.
If you’re looking for things to do, you can check out High Roller (0.4 mi), The Strip (0.8 mi), or Bellagio Fountains (0.9 mi), which are popular attractions amongst tourists, and they are all within walking distance.
We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at The Palazzo Resort Hotel Casino as you experience everything Las Vegas has to offer.

name: Hotel Milano Scala
description: Hotel Milano Scala is a Green Boutique Hotel that combines sophisticated hospitality and eco-sustainability. We are the first hotel in Milan and one of the few in Italy with ZERO EMISSIONS, thanks to a heat pump systems that exploit geothermal energy and allow the reduction of CO2 emissions to the outside. Furthermore, thanks to highly technological filters that capture polluting agents, the hotel offers its guests a healthier indoor air quality, with more than 80% reduction of fine dust. Thanks to these two features, the hotel has been included in the prestigious National Geographic Traveller UK Earth Collection 2019, which brings together the 36 most eco-friendly hotels in the world (we are the only one in all Italy). We also have a panoramic terrace that offers a 360° view over Milan, where we serve refined green cocktails inspired by the products of the rooftop garden on the sixth floor (vegetables, fruit, aromatic herbs and edible flowers). The hotel is also inspired by classical and Opera music: the tradition of the Teatro alla Scala can be felt everywhere in the hotel, especially during breakfast, always served with a live concert of harp or piano. Our location in the heart of Brera district allows our Guests to reach the most important points of interest in Milan in a few minutes, both on foot and by metro, thanks to the proximity of 3 metro lines (Cairoli MM1 Red Line, Lanza MM2 Green Line, Montenapoleone MM3 Yellow Line).
address: Via Dell'Orso 7, 20121 Milan Italy

The rooms on the highest floors of the hotel offer a breathtaking view of the Duomo of Milan and Castello Sforzesco, just a few steps away. With a short walk you can reach the nerve centres of the city such as Galleria Vittorio Emanuele, Piazza della Scala and the historic Brera district. M1 Cairoli and Cordusio underground stations are just a 2-minute walk away and the M1/M3 Duomo station is 5 minutes away. This hotel in the centre of Milan is close to the most famous shopping streets such as Via Monte Napoleone, the Quadrilatero della Moda and Piazza San Babila. Piccolo Teatro Strehler and Teatro dal Verme are 9 and 5 minutes away respectively.

description: Just 200 metres from Milano Centrale Train Station, Hotel Bernina features rooms with WiFi access, a flat-screen TV, and a minibar. It also offers room service. The Bernina Hotel has excellent public transport links around Milan and to its international airports. Milan Cathedral is just 4 metro stops away. Rooms here are bright and comfortable with parquet floors. They come with a private bathroom with hairdryer. WiFi access is available throughout the hotel and there is an internet point in the lobby. A varied breakfast buffet is served from 07:00 until 10:30. You will also find a bar and a reception open 24 hours a day. The Rho Fiera Milano exhibition centres are both within 15 km of the property. Stazione Centrale is a great choice for travellers interested in shopping for clothes, shopping and sightseeing.

name: Uptown Palace
description: The Uptown Palace is a 4-star superior business hotel in Milan. It is modern and elegant and situated a short walk from the Missori metro stop (yellow line), from Piazza Duomo and from Milan's famous shopping streets. The carefully chosen and highly qualified multilingual staff guarantee high levels of service and care for every guest. The Uptown Palace has 165 fully soundproofed rooms. Floors in the rooms are parquet or carpet while those in the public areas are marble. Each room has LCD televisions and en suite bathrooms with shower or bathtub, together with fluffy robes, slippers, hairdryers and a stylish selection of toiletries. The Presidential Suite and four of the Executive suites have an atmospheric view of the Duomo and of the rooftops of busy Milan. Uptown Palace offers its guests a destination par excellence where every dream can come true.

name: Hotel Da Vinci
description: L’Hotel Da Vinci Milano è un albergo a 4 stelle, con 307 camere, situato in via Senigallia 6. Il complesso si trova proprio alle porte di Milano, a 150 metri dalla stazione di Bruzzano e circa un chilometro dalla metropolitana Comasina (MM3 – Linea Gialla). Per raggiungere il centro città è possibile prendere il treno dalla stazione di Bruzzano a quella di Cadorna e poi fare 3 fermate di metropolitana (MM1 – Linea Rossa) da Cadorna a Duomo oppure prendere la metro MM3 – Linea Gialla da Comasina a Duomo per 11 fermate. In alternativa, si può prendere la linea S2 o S4 delle Ferrovie Nord dalla stazione di Bruzzano o l’autobus 41 a pochi passi dall’hotel, scendere ad Affori e prendere la metropolitana MM3 – Linea Gialla fino a Duomo per 10 fermate. L’albergo dispone di un bar, un ristorante e un centro congressi con 12 sale riunioni; ogni camera è dotata di aria condizionata, riscaldamento, insonorizzazione, moquette, minibar, cassaforte, TV a schermo piatto, canali satellitari, scrivania, telefono, sveglia telefonica, armadio o guardaroba, biancheria per la casa, soluzioni anallergiche, Wi-Fi gratis e un bagno privato, decorato con piastrelle a mosaico, con vasca o doccia, asciugacapelli, asciugamani e prodotti da bagno in omaggio.
address: Via Senigallia 6, 20161 Milan Italy

name: The Corner Hotel
description:
The Corner Hotel is located at 178 Mallorca Street, in the heart of the city, in the Eixample district at the intersection of Mallorca and Muntaner streets. This unbeatable location puts the hotel just a few minutes' walk from many of Barcelona's landmarks such as Avinguda Diagonal, Plaça Catalunya and Passeig de Gràcia, home to the city's famous modernist gems, including La Pedrera and Casa Batlló.

The Corner offers a total of 72 rooms that combine elegance and functionality with a touch of industrial design. All rooms are fully equipped with the latest technology, plus Wi-Fi Internet connection, safe, Smart TV, piped music and Bluetooth connection, individual climate control, pillow menu, minibar, kettle and welcome mineral water.

In addition, it has a range of services to meet any need, such as online check-in, 24-hour reception, laundry service, room service, business center, meeting room, luggage room, private parking, and adapted access and spaces.

Its leisure spaces stand out. On the first floor is The Tangram Bar, a different, open space, a meeting point for guests and locals. A place to enjoy the first coffee, have a light lunch or the last tapa of the night. On the seventh floor is an oasis in the heart of Barcelona that allows you to take refuge from the hustle and bustle of the city and relax enjoying the solarium, the outdoor pool and the Rooftop Bar.

Enjoy your stay in Barcelona!

With our modern amenities and thoughtful design, the Best Western Plus Hotel Alfa Aeropuerto will stand out among other hotels in Barcelona,CT. For the business traveler, a spacious work desk and free internet access are included in all our guest rooms to ensure you don't miss a beat while you're away from the office. For extended stays, each room provides a convenient in-room mini fridge that is ideal for drinks and snacks.  We also have an in-house fitness room, so you can keep up your workout routine while you're on the road. As always, the Best Western Plus Hotel Alfa Aeropuerto will provide you with the superior customer service that you are used to at Best Western® Hotels & Resorts.

name: Hotel Cuatro Naciones
description: Quite affordable in light of its extremely central location on Las Ramblas, the Hotel Cuatro Naciones in Barcelona has been providing basic rooms for more than 300 years . Turn-of-the century style unfolds in a lobby decked out with high crown molding, wrought ironwork, and marble galore. ... Read MoreA sweeping staircase leads to 54 simplistic rooms with white walls and punchy pink bedspreads and curtains. Floors are smooth stone mosaic. There's also an elevator, if stairs aren't your thing. Fourteen of the rooms at the Hotel Cuatro Naciones offer sweeping views of La Rambla. The first floor salon is a must-see, featuring hotel-related news clippings through the ages and signed photos and memorabilia of the hotel's most famous guests. The fancy guest history includes Stendhal, Frederic-Francois Chopin, Ulysses S. Grant, and Buffalo Bill.

name: Hotel Colon
description: There are certain pleasures that are only available to those that stay at the Hotel Colón. For example, waking up early in the morning, crossing over to the window, pulling aside the curtains, and seeing the image of the Barcelona Cathedral bathed in the sun’s first rays. It’s an image that will fill you with energy throughout the whole day! Many of our 129 rooms in the hotel offer this privilege, in addition to amenities such as air-conditioning, telephone, LCD television with international channels, high-speed Internet, safety deposit box, a well-stocked mini-bar, and the finishing touches of a 4 star hotel. If you are traveling for leisure, after a nice shower and a full breakfast, you’ll find it convenient to have the main tourist attractions within walking distance. If you are traveling for professional reasons, having two ample lounges at your disposal offers you infinite options for any event, convention, business meeting, or celebration. In both cases, it’s good to know that, for lunch or dinner, you can depend on the excellent service at the Cathedral 1951 restaurant. All of these reasons make a stay at the Hotel Colón unforgettable. What more can you ask of a hotel?
